sentences.english: Speak the truth always, even if it leads to your death.
sentences.chinese: 不打誑語，即使實話實說會招來殺身之禍。

sentences.english: Counterintuitive, perhaps, but research shows it to be true.
sentences.chinese: 或許這有違直覺，但研究表明這並非誑語。

definition: to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
lit. persons who walk different paths cannot make plans together/to go separate ways (idiom)
pinyin: dao4 bu4 tong2 bu4 xiang1 wei2 mou2

definition: to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge
worse than a beast/to behave immorally
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
